articles.author: Jordan Valinsky
articles.title: LG is sending free stickers to 500,000 customers who bought its recalled stove that caused 28 house fires - CNN
articles.description: LG has recalled \electric ranges that have been involved in at least 28 fires and eight burn injuries, with five fires causing property damage of more than $340,000 and three fires resulting in pet deaths.
articles.content: LG is recalling 500,000 electric ranges that have been involved in at least 28 fires and caused several injuries. However, customers who comply arent receiving refunds or exchanges theyre getting stiâ€¦ [+1108 chars]
